Text: I am in the process of planning an event that will bring together senior executives from across the energy industry to discuss the development of renewable energy strategies The conference will take place in early April in London I am seeking to identify speakers from oil and gas companies power generating companies governments financial and advisory organisations technology companies associations institutes and federations The programme will examine the whole spectrum of renewable energy sources with the dynamics and needs of energy companies themselves in mind I would appreciate your thoughts on topics that should be included potential speakerscontributors that you could recommend and which sources of renewable energy you consider to be the most significant If you would like to discuss any aspect of the conference please do not hesitate to contact me and I very much welcome your suggestions Kind regards Emma Watts Conference Producer Global Business Network Ltd Wimpole Street London WM LB England Tel Fax
